text: Barba was a popular character on the long-running procedural where he was a by-the-book, no-nonsense attorney. In the role, Esparza, who is Cuban-American, also used his Spanish in some scenes. Many of his scenes were with Hargitay discussing the details of a case in his office and in court. Wednesday night, the hashtag barbaontrial was trending about the episode as fans and cast members were sad about the actor’s departure from the show.
title: Miami's Raul Esparza exits NBC's 'Law and Order: SVU'
